page.title: 14Dudleston Hall (continued)
page.content: They also keep{sheep}but not many because this is the first year they have kept them. The breed they keep are{Welsh Sheep.}They did have 200 ewes but they sold most of them recently. They sell the lambs and wool, the lambs go to{Wrexham}and the wool goes to{Ruthin Wools}where they are all graded according to their quality. They usually sell{8 kilograms each time, but the{Welsh Sheep}do not produce very good quality wool. The different qualities of wool are used for the following: {Good quality-jumpers,clothing etc. {Medium quality-carpets,rugs etc. {Poor quality-stuffing cushions etc They keep{2 sheep dogs}which are very useful when rounding up the sheep. They also keep{15 chickens}which are{free range.}The hens are good layers and about{12 a week}are sold.
